name: creative-team
description: Creative content production plugin with 13 specialized agents organized in strategic workflow layers. Strategy Layer: X0 content analyst, X1 advertising strategist, X2 copywriter, X3 design deconstructor, X4 brand strategist; Design Layer: X5 Canvas layout specialist, X6 React frontend designer; AIGC Core Cluster (集中相邻): X7 animated GIF designer, X8 algorithmic artist, X9 photorealistic image specialist, X10 AI music composer, X11 AI video generator, X12 AI voice synthesizer; plus XX creative team leader for orchestration.
